programme.title: Megalodon: The Frenzy
programme.desc: The stakes have never been higher when a "frenzy" of five Megalodons, spawn of the original, terrorizes the open ocean.

programme.title: Ape vs. Monster
programme.desc: A vessel oozes a sludge that triggers massive growth in an ape, as well as a passing Gila monster.

programme.title: Intermedio
programme.desc: Four unlucky friends encounter deadly creatures in tunnels on the Mexican border.

programme.title: Mega Piranha
programme.desc: A mutant strain of giant ferocious piranha escape from the Amazon and eat their way toward Florida.

programme.title: King of the Lost World
programme.desc: Survivors of a plane crash in the Amazon encounter giant scorpions, dragons and a gorilla.

programme.title: War of the Worlds 2: The Next Wave
programme.desc: Mankind unites to fight back when a second alien invasion threatens Earth.

programme.title: Independents Day
programme.desc: Aliens invade Earth and give humans a choice to emigrate to a new planet or be killed.

programme.title: Snowmageddon
programme.desc: When a family is given a snow globe with a perfect reflection of their own town, they never imagine it would have the power to destroy their mountain community. Whatever happens in the snow globe happens to the town for real.

programme.title: San Andreas Quake
programme.desc: A discredited L.A. seismologist warns of an impending 12.7 earthquake.

programme.title: Independents Day
programme.desc: Aliens invade Earth and give humans a choice to emigrate to a new planet or be killed.

programme.title: Day the Earth Stopped, The
programme.desc: Humanity must prove its worth or be wiped out by robots.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: An imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant.

programme.title: Disaster Strike Force
programme.desc: A devastating deep freeze threatens the East Coast.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut crashes to earth, Citizen Z gets a real live buddy.

programme.title: AE Apocalypse Earth
programme.desc: Refugees from Earth land on a planet and fight ruthless aliens to survive.

programme.title: Triassic Hunt
programme.desc: When two dinosaurs break out of a lab and attack an industrial park, a ragtag group of mercenaries is called in to contain the creatures before they decimate the park and escape into the world.

programme.title: Attila
programme.desc: Attila the Hun's mummified remains are awakened when his riches are stolen.
